about.title: About Me
about.description: Get to know me - developer, writer, tech enthusiast
about.aboutText1: Hi! I'm a passionate developer who loves sharing clear, accessible documentation that helps developers of all skill levels grow and succeed.
about.aboutText2: When I'm not coding or writing, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or, Not working at all.
about.skills: C++, and anything claude code can do.
about.contactText: I'm always open to interesting conversations, collaborations, or feedback on my work. Feel free to reach out:
